channel.title: Major Digest - Reliable and Comprehensive News Sources: tech
channel.description: Get the latest news online at Major Digest, the top online news resource for the most reliable news sources. Stay informed about the world around you!

image.title: Major Digest - Reliable and Comprehensive News Sources: tech

item.title: Hybristophilia: Study links TikTok to women’s sexual attraction to criminals
item.description: Ted Bundy had courtroom groupies. Jeffrey Dahmer and Richard Ramirez were sent love letters in prison. Now, in the age of social media, thousands like, share, and thirst in the comments over stylized fan edits of serial killers. There’s a term for this psychological phenomenon: hybristophilia.
item.dc:creator: Eve Upton-Clark, Fast Company

item.title: How I ended up with 111,582 iPhone photos, and what I’m doing about it
item.description: Greetings and thank you once again for reading Fast Company’s Plugged In—and a happy Halloween to you. Recently, I used Apple Photos to revisit the photos I took during the 2015 Thanksgiving holiday. There were some gems in there—memories I’d like to preserve forever.
item.dc:creator: Harry McCracken, Fast Company

item.title: Amazon carries Wall Street to the finish of another winning week and month
item.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Amazon led the U.S. stock market on Friday to the finish of another winning week and month. The S&P 500 rose 0.3% and pulled closer to its all-time high set on Tuesday.
item.dc:creator: STAN CHOE, Associated Press, The Hill

item.title: How Apple managed to deliver a strong third quarter despite a global trade war
item.description: Apple delivered financial results during its summertime quarter that exceeded analyst projections, despite being caught in the crosshairs of a global trade war at the same time the trendsetting company is scrambling to catch up to its Big Tech peers in the artificial intelligence race.
item.dc:creator: Associated Press, Fast Company

item.title: Amazon’s third-quarter results get a boost from its cloud computing business
item.description: Amazon posted higher fiscal third quarter profit and sales compared with a year ago, fueled by accelerating growth in its cloud computing business and strong spending by its customers looking for low prices at a time when inflation is resurging.
item.dc:creator: Associated Press, Fast Company

item.title: Proton's new observatory reveals over 100 billion records breached - here's what you need to know
item.description: Proton, the company behind Proton VPN, has launched a new tool to track data breaches by monitoring the dark web. The Data Breach Observatory aims to provide a more accurate and timelier picture of cybercrime than official corporate disclosures.
item.dc:creator: Rene Millman, TechRadar

item.title: Apple posts strong holiday outlook after sales decline in China
item.description: Apple Inc. projected a jump in sales over the holiday season after releasing new iPhones and worked to reassure investors concerned about a decline in revenue from China.
item.dc:creator: Bloomberg, The Mercury News

item.title: Amazon’s cloud acceleration calms investor fears of AI bubble
item.description: Amazon.com Inc. posted robust cloud growth that reassured investors that the tens of billions of dollars the company and its peers are pouring into artificial intelligence will pay off.
item.dc:creator: Bloomberg, The Mercury News

item.title: S&P 500 jumps as strong Amazon, Apple scorecards reignite rally
item.description: US stocks gained on Friday as blowout earnings results from Amazon.com Inc. and a strong holiday forecast from Apple Inc. rekindled risk appetite.
item.dc:creator: Bloomberg, The Mercury News

item.title: ESPN, ABC and other Disney services pulled from YouTube TV
item.description: The dispute between the two media giants centers on the price YouTube TV pays Disney for access to its content.
item.dc:creator: Meg Hilling, NewsNation

item.title: Fortnite The Simpsons live event build up: our live coverage of the upcoming The Simpsons crossover including start time and what we know so far
item.description: Here's our live coverage of the Fortnite The Simpsons live event, including everything you need to know in the build up to launch.
item.dc:creator: Jake Green, TechRadar

item.title: AMD to build two more supercomputers at Oak Ridge National Labs
item.description: The collaboration between AMD and the U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) Facility at the Oak Ridge National Laboratory (ORNL) continues, with two more supercomputers planned to join the two that already are deployed.
item.dc:creator: Network World

item.title: Apple delivers strong quarter despite trade war challenges and ongoing artificial technology issues
item.description: Apple delivered financial results during its summertime quarter that exceeded analyst projections, despite being caught in the crosshairs of a global trade war at the same time the trendsetting company is scrambling to catch up to its Big Tech peers in the artificial intelligence race.
item.dc:creator: Michael Liedtke, Associated Press, Local 4

item.title: Strengthening security with a converged security and networking platform
item.description: Today’s IT environment of multiple clouds, hybrid work, and the exploding popularity of AI has given cybercriminals unprecedented opportunities for launching attacks — and the traditional arsenal of tools organizations use to stop them isn’t working.
item.dc:creator: Network World

item.title: Bessent says TikTok deal finalized
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said Thursday the U.S. and China have finalized an agreement on TikTok that would allow the popular social media platform to remain available in the U.S.
item.dc:creator: Julia Shapero, The Hill

item.title: How tiny drones inspired by bats could save lives in dark and stormy conditions
item.description: WORCESTER, Mass. (AP) — Don't be fooled by the fog machine, spooky lights and fake bats: the robotics lab at Worcester Polytechnic Institute lab isn't hosting a Halloween party.
item.dc:creator: HOLLY RAMER, Associated Press, ABC 4

item.title: Universal Music and AI song tool Udio settle lawsuit and partner on new platform, sparking backlash
item.description: Universal Music Group and AI platform Udio have settled a copyright lawsuit and will collaborate on a new music creation and streaming platform.
item.dc:creator: Kelvin Chan, Associated Press, Local 4

item.title: Meta shares slide after company projects higher expenses for 2026
item.description: Meta's stock slid in after-hours trading on Wednesday after the tech giant posted strong third-quarter results but warned that its expenses will be significantly higher in 2026 than this year. Like its rivals, Meta Platforms Inc.
item.dc:creator: BARBARA ORTUTAY, Associated Press, Fox 5

item.title: Microsoft deploys a fix to Azure cloud service that's hit with outage
item.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Microsoft has deployed a fix to address an outage of their Azure cloud portal that left users unable to access Office 365, Minecraft and other services.
item.dc:creator: Associated Press, ABC 4

item.title: Phony AI-generated videos of Hurricane Melissa flood social media sites
item.description: One viral video shows what appears to be four sharks swimming in a Jamaican hotel's pool as floodwaters allegedly brought on by Hurricane Melissa swamp the area. Another purportedly depicts Jamaica's Kingston airport completely ravaged by the storm.
item.dc:creator: TAIMOOR SOBHAN and KELVIN CHAN, Associated Press, KGET 17, NBC

item.title: IBM expands professional services for Cisco firewalls
item.description: IBM Technology Lifecycle Services has added Cisco’s firewall technology to its enterprise menu, expanding the range of technical services TLS offers for virtual and physical firewalls. IBM TLS will service Cisco’s Secure Firewall platform which is a core part of its Hybrid Mesh Firewall system.
item.dc:creator: Network World

item.title: Nvidia looks to power AI factory networks
item.description: Networking technology took center stage at Nvidia’s GTC DC developers show in Washington, D.C. as a range of networking products were introduced for high-performance AI inference processing and more.
item.dc:creator: Network World

item.title: 5 social media safety tips to protect your privacy online
item.description: Kurt Knutsson's guide covers social media privacy protection through location settings, account privacy controls and two-factor authentication to prevent scams and data breaches.
item.dc:creator: Fox News

item.title: Musk launches Grokipedia, AI-powered alternative to Wikipedia
item.description: Elon Musk launched Grokipedia on Monday as an alternative to the nonprofit-powered Wikipedia. Musk’s version is backed by xAI but still uses Wikipedia as a source on most subjects.
item.dc:creator: Ashleigh Fields, The Hill

item.title: How to use passkeys to keep your computer safe
item.description: Learn how to use passkeys on Windows and Mac computers without cameras or fingerprint readers. Discover secure authentication methods that replace passwords.
item.dc:creator: Fox News

item.title: New military age demands new C2 comms
item.description: As purposely scattered forces replace massing, all units need access to rich and latency-free crucial situational data regardless of from where they operate. The post New military age demands new C2 comms first appeared on Federal News Network.
item.dc:creator: Tom Temin, Federal News Network

item.title: Anthropic draws fire from White House with AI warnings
item.description: Anthropic has been a rare voice within the artificial intelligence (AI) industry cautioning about the downsides of the technology it develops and supporting regulation — a stance that has recently drawn the ire of the Trump administration and its allies in Silicon Valley.
item.dc:creator: Julia Shapero, The Hill

item.title: Meta AI edits your camera roll for better Facebook posts
item.description: Facebook's new Meta AI feature analyzes your camera roll photos to create polished collages automatically, but requires cloud processing and raises privacy concerns.
item.dc:creator: Fox News
